name: Shape Cascade
description:
Test your skills with this arcade game. Put the falling shapes into the right place as fast as you can. More shapes will arrive when level progress. Raise into the world rank leaderboard.

  • 15 Levels to Play
  • Each Shape As Different Physic Behavior
  • Random Bonus to Catch
  • Different cursors to unlock
  • Steam Leaderboard

Squeeze the Laughman!

Catch the bonus Star!

Unlock different cursors to better push the shapes!
